org.openimaj.lsh.composition

Class RandomProjectionHashComposition<OBJECT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.hash.composition.HashComposition<OBJECT>
      • org.openimaj.lsh.composition.RandomProjectionHashComposition<OBJECT>
  • Type Parameters:
    OBJECT - Object being hashed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashFunction<OBJECT>

    public class RandomProjectionHashComposition<OBJECT>
extends HashComposition<OBJECT>
    Compose a set of hash functions by computing the dot product of the hashes they produce with a random vector.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
